title: The Researcher

fields.name: Check-In (x2, Charge 90%):
fields.value: Each night, you will receive a list of players proportional to your score. You may target one player from this list, or two if you placed in the Top 3 in the last Evening phase. If they use an ability tonight, you will know, and you will be told how much ammo the ability has after it's used, along with the Charge, if applicable. You will only know the current Charge of the ability, not the amount needed to gain ammo.

fields.name: Miracle Cure (Charge 200%, Locked):
fields.value: This ability is unlocked after you score a cumulative 200% across all rounds. Target a player. You will increase their Defense Power for the Night by 0.2x, and you will cure any medical ailments they have, such as bleeding, infection, crippling, and similar (up to host discretion). If the player was converted as a result a medical ailment, such as zombification, this will fail, but you will be told why.
